Measure.name: Count

Measure.description: Count of all cases in this group where the patient is in a group living situation

Measure.description: Count of cases in this group with a day care association

Measure.description: Count of cases in this group where the patient is a healthcare worker

MeasureExpression.SQL: CASE WHEN healthcare_worker = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Measure.name: Food handler
Measure.description: Count of cases in this group where the patient is a food handler

MeasureExpression.SQL: CASE WHEN food_handler = 'Yes' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
